info.title: Onboarding Application for Current and Savings Accounts
info.description:
##### Introduction This documents describes the detail of OPEN API FOR HK CASA The Open API for HK CASA serves the business functions associated with **Products and Services** offered by the bank. The operations and the features supported in this API are described in the following sections.
##### Authentication To make a request to any of the APIs, the client has to present an Access Token, following the OAuth 2.0 specifications.
The OAuth endpoints are summarized below. https:\/\/api.sc.com\/retail\/v1\/oauth2\/token
**Parameters**
Key Value
grant_type Indicates the type of grant being presented in exchange for an access token and possibly a refresh token, for more details, please refer to the table below
client_id The public identifier for the application, obtained when the caller first registered the application
client_secret The applicationâ€™s client secret. This ensures that the request to get the access token is made only from the application, and not from a potential attacker that may have intercepted the authorization code.
Grant Type Usage
Client credentials For the client app to identify itself to the SC API platform, the /token endpoint has to be called with query param grant_type set to client_credentials
Auth-code based grant For the client app to identify itself to the SC API platform, the /token endpoint has to be called with query param grant_type set to auth_code_grant
##### Error Handling The API endpoints return an error response whenever the request could not be processed successfully. In such scenarios, API provides the clients with a precise Application Error code and description in the error payload associated with HTTP Status codes 4xx or 5xx.
The table below provides a list of such possible Application Errors, for effective error handling of API consumers.
Response error code Detail
API-CASA-1-100 Input data is not valid
API-CASA-1-101 Invalid query parameters
API-CASA-2-100 Requested resource not found

version.description: The Open API endpoints are accessible via **https** only

post.description: To create application for 1st time, use this POST method with mandatory fields

parameters.name: transaction-id
parameters.description: Transaction Id, random alphanumeric value, hyphen or underscore allowed

patch.description: This update is PATCH method, which can be sent multiple times until submit-flag set to Y

parameters.name: transaction-id
parameters.description: Transaction Id, random alphanumeric value, hyphen or underscore allowed

nationality.description: Valid 2 ISO Country Code, It Should be array

address.description: List of address, residential address and mailing address, please refer to address object

annual-salary-gross.description: should be between 0 and 100,000,000 and integer only

application-ref-id.description: For createApplication Service, This field is not required, For an updateApplication this field is mandatory
